assessment_item.title: AKSTL4 Q5.Accounting treatment for “Accrued incomes”:
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

Accounting treatment for “Accrued incomes”:

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

It will be recorded on assets side as a current asset in the balance sheet

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1185"},{"text":"

It will be recorded on the liability side as a current liability in the balance sheet

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1186"},{"text":"

It will be recorded on debit side of the trading account as an expense

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1196"},{"text":"

It will be recorded on debit side of profit and loss account as an expense

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1201"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"AKSTL4 Q5.Accounting treatment for “Accrued incomes”:","title":"AKSTL4 Q5.Accounting treatment for “Accrued incomes”:","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"English","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Accountancy Volume 2","qlevel":"EASY","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
